archimate:ApplicationFunction.name: Account Receivable GL posting
archimate:ApplicationFunction.documentation: Accounts Receivable (A/R) Management function of Posting customer revenue account: Recording of revenues and expenses at the General Ledger level provide necessary tools to maintain the customer account receivable. Aggregate customer accounts for general ledger: Group receivables by type of customer accounts, through grouping of individual customersï¿½ A/R accounts
